meta.title: Terms of Service - ToolsLab | Free Developer Tools
meta.description: Terms of service for ToolsLab - 100% free developer tools with no registration required. Simple, fair terms for our community.
meta.ogDescription: Simple and fair terms for using ToolsLab's free developer tools.

header.title: Terms of Service
header.subtitle: Simple rules for our free developer tools
header.tldrText: ToolsLab is free, forever. Use our tools responsibly, don't do illegal stuff, and remember we don't offer warranties. We're developers helping other developers.

freeService.title: 100% Free Service
freeService.intro: ToolsLab is and will always remain completely free:

points.noCost: No cost: All tools are free, forever
points.noAccount: No account required: Never, for any reason
points.noFreemium: No freemium: No "Pro" or premium versions exist
points.noLimits: No artificial limits: Use the tools as much as you want
points.openSource: Open source: Code is available on GitHub

freeService.promise: üíù Our promise: ToolsLab was born from developer passion for developers. It will never become paid.

warranties.title: Limitation of Warranties
warranties.disclaimerText: ToolsLab tools are provided "AS IS", without warranties of any kind.

points.functionality: Functionality: We don't guarantee tools are always perfect
points.accuracy: Accuracy: Always verify results, especially for critical use
points.bugs: Bugs: There might be errors or unexpected behavior
points.dataLoss: Data loss: Processed data might be lost
points.security: Security: Don't input sensitive data (even though it stays local)
